channel.title: Conquest #317
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/TWjn20f.png[/img][/center]
Hello and welcome to my official project, I had to re-do this project with a new base and all because I lost my old source due to my host being shut down and them being 'apparently' unable to retrieve my files.
This project that I am working on will reflect that of the classic Mopar servers (click-based training) and will include most of the newer revision items, if there is any questions on what this server will or will not have feel free to post below.
[SIZE=3][U][B]Features:[/B][/U][/SIZE]
[ul][*]Click Based Training (1250xp per 950xp HP) [*]Newer Revision Items (Claws, Torva, Etc.) [*]Dicing [*]8GB Dedicated VPS [*]Many Shops (all items obtainable by normal players no donator only items!) [*]Kill/Death Ratio Ranking System In-Game [*]New Smithing System for Trimming Armour [*]New Crafting System for Recoloring Armour [*]Summoning System in Music Tab [*]Armour Set Exchange/Creating [*]Thieving/Pking/Staking/Training for money making [*]All Items Accessible [*]Will be updated as updates continue..[/ul]
[SPOILER=Latest Update]Progress getting done today with me finalizing both Thieving and Fishing!
You can now start thieving by heading to the area shown in this picture. [img]http://conquest-317.com/images/theiving.png[/img]
Here you can steal from 6 different stalls with 4 different items to be stolen per stall there is a lot of variety in what you can get. The merchant above buys all the item(s) you may get when training here. I believe the image above best describes the level requirements and whereabouts allow this to help with the items you can get from the stalls.
[code]Theiving:
Order: Least Worth -> Most Worth
Food Table (Level 1): Bannana Anchovy Pizza Poison Karambawn Chilli Potato
General Table (Level 25): Broken Armour Rusty Sword Golden Feather Golden Needle
Magic Table (Level 50): Gold Ring Magical Orb Magic Chest Magic Box
Scimitar Table (Level 75): Decorative Sword 1 Decorative Sword 2 Decorative Sword 3 Mounted Sword
Gem Table (Level 90): Opal Jade Red Topaz Dragonstone
Crafting Table (Level 95): Gold Ore 'Perfect Gold Ore' 'Perfect Gold Bar' 'Perfect Gold Necklace' [/code]
Now onto Fishing, where I have changed the following:
There are 4 fishing spots in the middle of Varrock's fountain you may now follow this image to fish the correct spots [i][u][b]HOWEVER [/b][/u][/i] the monkfish spot has now been replaced with Manta Ray's and they also require level 91 fishing to acquire. See image below: [img]http://conquest-317.com/images/Media.png[/img]
There is also now a man who not only sells fishing supplies but also will take and note all the fish you have in your inventory so you don't have to run back to the bank.
Newest Updates: 1/15 chances when training/thieving you will receive either of the following:
1. Low Chance Box (low chance of a good reward). 2. Medium Chance Box (medium chance of a good reward). 3. High Chance Box (high chance of good reward). 4. Chest Gambling Key (allows you to use one time on the chest by the thieving area).
[img]http://conquest-317.com/images/Random%20Chest.png[/img] [img]http://conquest-317.com/images/Random%20Key.png[/img]
[img]http://conquest-317.com/images/16.png[/img] [img]http://conquest-317.com/images/162.png[/img]
More updates are rolling out stay updated![/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Media] [center] [B]Home: This is the beginning area of the server had to keep this original to claim to be a Mopar classic server.[/B] [img]http://conquest-317.com/images/Home.png[/img]
[B]Training Area: All you old-timers should be well aware of how this works![/B] [img]http://conquest-317.com/images/Train.png[/img]
[B][U]Buy/Exchange/Create your own set(s) of armour in-game![/U][/B] [img]http://conquest-317.com/images/Sets.png[/img] [img]http://conquest-317.com/images/Exchange.png[/img]
[B]Wild: Outside of bank only safe-spots in Varrock: Fishing Area, Training Area, Thieving Area, Smithing Area.[/B] [img]http://conquest-317.com/images/Wild.png[/img]
[B]PkBox: Safe do-NOT lose items.[/B] [img]http://conquest-317.com/images/PkBox.png[/img]
[B]Fishing: Only way to get sharks/rocktails/mantas.[/B] [img]http://conquest-317.com/images/Media.png[/img]
[B]Stat Adjustments: Correct adjustments with prayer.[/B] [img]http://conquest-317.com/images/Stat%20Adjustments.png[/img]
[B]Thieving Area: With great ways of earing gold![/B] [img]http://conquest-317.com/images/theiving.png[/img]
[B]Randomly obtain a Key for a gambling chest or a Casket with random rewards by training or thieving![/B] [img]http://conquest-317.com/images/Random%20Key.png[/img] [img]http://conquest-317.com/images/Random%20Chest.png[/img]
[B]If you're lucky enough to get one of these keys these are the possible rewards![/B] [img]http://conquest-317.com/images/16.png[/img] [img]http://conquest-317.com/images/162.png[/img] [/spoiler][/center]
[spoiler=Smithing System & Crafting System] This is the current layout of my new smithing system, working on the new crafting system for recolors, etc. [center]
[table] [tr][td] [th]Level[/th] [th]Item[/th] [th]XP[/th] [/td][/tr] [tr] [td]1[/td] [td]Studded (t), Wizzy (t)[/td] [td]150[/td] [/tr] [tr] [td]10[/td] [td]Black (t)[/td] [td]200[/td] [/tr] [tr] [td]25[/td] [td]Adamant (t), Green D'hide (t)[/td] [td]275[/td] [/tr] [tr] [td]40[/td] [td]Rune (t), Blue D'hide (t)[/td] [td]375[/td] [/tr] [tr] [td]50[/td] [td]Studded (g), Wizzy (g)[/td] [td]425[/td] [/tr] [tr] [td]65[/td] [td]Black (g)[/td] [td]475[/td] [/tr] [tr] [td]75[/td] [td]Adamant (g), Green D'hide (g)[/td] [td]550[/td] [/tr] [tr] [td]85[/td] [td]God Armours (Saradomin, Guthix, Zamorak)[/td] [td]675[/td] [/tr] [tr] [td]90[/td] [td]New God Armours (Bandos, Armadyl)[/td] [td]750[/td] [/tr] [tr] [td]95[/td] [td]Gilded[/td] [td]950[/td] [/tr] [/table] [/center]Crafting table being created.[/spoiler]
Will be updating this thread more once I get home from work, thanks for viewing!

item.title: Conquest #317
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

I really like how you’re trying to be creative. You need to make it look smooth ingame though, your thieving is poorly organized. You should organize them around the town, instead of clustered together. Anyways, good luck.

Read full topic

item.title: Conquest #317
item.dc:creator: @MicroZoft MicroZoft
item.description:
@MicroZoft wrote:

[center][/center]

Hello and welcome to my official project, I had to re-do this project with a new base and all because I lost my old source due to my host being shut down and them being ‘apparently’ unable to retrieve my files.

This project that I am working on will reflect that of the classic Mopar servers (click-based training) and will include most of the newer revision items, if there is any questions on what this server will or will not have feel free to post below.

[SIZE=3][U][B]Features:[/B][/U][/SIZE]

[ul][]Click Based Training (1250xp per 950xp HP)
[]Newer Revision Items (Claws, Torva, Etc.)
[]Dicing
[]8GB Dedicated VPS
[]Many Shops (all items obtainable by normal players no donator only items!)
[]Kill/Death Ratio Ranking System In-Game
[]New Smithing System for Trimming Armour
[]New Crafting System for Recoloring Armour
[]Summoning System in Music Tab
[]Armour Set Exchange/Creating
[]Thieving/Pking/Staking/Training for money making
[]All Items Accessible
[*]Will be updated as updates continue…[/ul]

[SPOILER=Latest Update]Progress getting done today with me finalizing both Thieving and Fishing!

You can now start thieving by heading to the area shown in this picture.

Here you can steal from 6 different stalls with 4 different items to be stolen per stall there is a lot of variety in what you can get. The merchant above buys all the item(s) you may get when training here. I believe the image above best describes the level requirements and whereabouts allow this to help with the items you can get from the stalls.

[code]Theiving:

Order: Least Worth -> Most Worth

Food Table (Level 1):
Bannana
Anchovy Pizza
Poison Karambawn
Chilli Potato

General Table (Level 25):
Broken Armour
Rusty Sword
Golden Feather
Golden Needle

Magic Table (Level 50):
Gold Ring
Magical Orb
Magic Chest
Magic Box

Scimitar Table (Level 75):
Decorative Sword 1
Decorative Sword 2
Decorative Sword 3
Mounted Sword

Gem Table (Level 90):
Opal
Jade
Red Topaz
Dragonstone

Crafting Table (Level 95):
Gold Ore
’Perfect Gold Ore’
‘Perfect Gold Bar’
‘Perfect Gold Necklace’
[/code]

Now onto Fishing, where I have changed the following:

There are 4 fishing spots in the middle of Varrock’s fountain you may now follow this image to fish the correct spots HOWEVER the monkfish spot has now been replaced with Manta Ray’s and they also require level 91 fishing to acquire. See image below:

There is also now a man who not only sells fishing supplies but also will take and note all the fish you have in your inventory so you don’t have to run back to the bank.

Newest Updates: 1/15 chances when training/thieving you will receive either of the following:

  1. Low Chance Box (low chance of a good reward).
  2. Medium Chance Box (medium chance of a good reward).
  3. High Chance Box (high chance of good reward).
  4. Chest Gambling Key (allows you to use one time on the chest by the thieving area).



More updates are rolling out stay updated![/SPOILER]

[SPOILER=Media]
[center]
[B]Home: This is the beginning area of the server had to keep this original to claim to be a Mopar classic server.[/B]

[B]Training Area: All you old-timers should be well aware of how this works![/B]

[B][U]Buy/Exchange/Create your own set(s) of armour in-game![/U][/B]

[B]Wild: Outside of bank only safe-spots in Varrock: Fishing Area, Training Area, Thieving Area, Smithing Area.[/B]

[B]PkBox: Safe do-NOT lose items.[/B]

[B]Fishing: Only way to get sharks/rocktails/mantas.[/B]

[B]Stat Adjustments: Correct adjustments with prayer.[/B]

[B]Thieving Area: With great ways of earing gold![/B]

[B]Randomly obtain a Key for a gambling chest or a Casket with random rewards by training or thieving![/B]

[B]If you’re lucky enough to get one of these keys these are the possible rewards![/B]


[/spoiler][/center]

[spoiler=Smithing System & Crafting System]
This is the current layout of my new smithing system, working on the new crafting system for recolors, etc.
